item.title: Terraform Labs Wants Access to FTX Wallets in Fraud Case Defense
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Terraform Labs is making headlines once again, this time for seeking access to FTX wallets as part of its defense in its ongoing fraud case.  A recent report revealed that Terraform Labs has sought permission from a Judge to subpoena information from the bankrupt FTX crypto exchange. The data requested is said to be crucial

The post Terraform Labs Wants Access to FTX Wallets in Fraud Case Defense appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: SEC Chair Vows to Crackdown on AI if This Line is Crossed
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) enforcement actions know no bounds, and emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) now appear on the commission’s radar. SEC Chair on AI Regulation SEC Chairman Gary Gensler recently remarked that AI’s potential with respect to interference and disruption of market dynamics would attract the agency’s wrath.

The post SEC Chair Vows to Crackdown on AI if This Line is Crossed appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: New York Times Reveals Shocking ‘Notes’ Of Sam Bankman-Fried’s Girlfriend
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto News: Over seven months after crypto exchange FTX initiated Chapter 11 proceedings, baffling details about Sam Bankman-Fried’s girlfriend Caroline Ellison were found in documents accessed by The New York Times. item.title: Ex-SEC Chief Calls Jack Dorsey’s First Tweet NFT “Worthless” & NFT Marketplace A “Scam”
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
John Reed Stark, former Chief of the US Securities and Exchange Commission Enforcement Office, on Wednesday said the NFT of Jack Dorsey’s first Tweet now has no value or is essentially worthless. He argues that the NFT marketplace is totally manipulated or controlled by deceptive ways and the smart contracts are incapable of total security

item.description:
Terraform Labs (TFL) and former CEO Do Kwon seek to dismiss the lawsuit filed by the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) using Judge Torres’ ruling in the XRP lawsuit. Terra and Do Kwon earlier filed documents in support of the motion to dismiss the lawsuit claiming that the US SEC has no jurisdiction as

item.title: Ripple Community Mocks Republican For Calling XRP A Security; Analyst Predicts Re-Entry Level
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Ripple Vs SEC News: Some politicians tend to have low crypto literacy and continue to target the crypto industry, like a tweet by House Republican Jane Adams. XRP community including lawyer John Deaton corrected her after she calls XRP a security. XRP price jumps 5% in the last 24 hours, continuing its 75% rally witnessed

item.title: XRP Price Analysis: Analyst Foresees Parabolic Ascent To $15; Is It Realistic?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
XRP has become the talk of the crypto space since Ripple’s partial win in the long-standing legal battle with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) last week. item.title: Shiba Inu News: New Whale Moving 2.4 Trillion SHIB From BinanceUS? Price To Jump?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu News: 2.4 trillion Shiba Inu (SHIB) tokens were moved from BinanceUS to an unknown wallet, according to Whale Alert. Shiba Inu witnessed a rise in whale accumulation after lead developer Shytoshi Kusama announced the possibility of releasing the much-awaited Shibarium mainnet in August along with the Worldpaper. Shiba Inu Whale Moves 2.4 Trillion

The post Shiba Inu News: New Whale Moving 2.4 Trillion SHIB From BinanceUS? Price To Jump? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:

item.title: Tesla’s Bitcoin (BTC) Holdings Remained Unchanged for Q2, Now At $184 Million
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
American electric carmaker Tesla reported its second-quarter numbers on Wednesday, July 19. As it turns out, Tesla’s digital asset holdings remained unchanged during the second quarter, which stands at $184 million as of the current market position. Because of accounting regulations that don’t allow unrealized gains on cryptocurrencies to be recorded, the value of the

The post Tesla’s Bitcoin (BTC) Holdings Remained Unchanged for Q2, Now At $184 Million appeared first on CoinGape.
